name: Aaron Allen
summary: Full Stack Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and enterprise applications. Expert in Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, and Hibernate for backend development, with strong skills in React, Angular, and React Native for frontend solutions. Experienced in building high-performance, secure, and maintainable systems, integrating AI/ML features using Python, FastAPI, and TensorFlow/PyTorch. Skilled in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, cloud deployment (AWS/Azure), testing frameworks, performance optimization, and mentoring junior engineers in Agile environments.

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered enterprise-grade full-stack applications using Java and Kotlin with Spring Boot, Spring MVC, and Hibernate, implementing modular, scalable backend services for core financial workflows.

Developed RESTful and GraphQL APIs using Spring Boot (Java/Kotlin), translating complex business requirements into transactional, high-performance services backed by PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and SQL Server.
Built responsive frontend interfaces with React, Angular, and React Native, integrating backend APIs, authentication flows, and real-time data updates.
Designed and deployed AI-powered features using Python, FastAPI, and TensorFlow/PyTorch, including predictive analytics, intelligent search, and recommendation engines.
Implemented microservices and background processing pipelines leveraging Kotlin and Java, asynchronous processing, scheduled jobs, and message-driven architectures.
Established secure authentication and authorization across distributed systems using OAuth2, JWT, and RBAC, aligning with enterprise security standards.
Built CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, automating testing, builds, and cloud deployments, supporting multiple environments.
Optimized system performance with query tuning, caching strategies, asynchronous processing, and application profiling, improving throughput and response times.
Mentored junior engineers and conducted architecture and code reviews, promoting maintainable, modular code and team best practices.

Collaborated with designers and product managers to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions.
